attributes.description:
With a wide variety of vehicles to choose from, make your way to our dealership ASAP!

Autoworld Goodwood is your Number 1 dealer that suits all budgets! 

Trade ins Welcome + Finance Available.

Required Docs :
* ID
* DRIVERS LICENSE
* 3 MONTHS BANK STATEMENTS
* 3 LATEST PAYSLIPS

Self employed and blacklisted clients are welcomed too !

17 Voortrekker road, Goodwood
021 592 0823

attributes.description:
BB Motor Group is a well-established franchise with a wide variety of new & pre-owned vehicles, service departments & parts. As part of a 60-year legacy, we strive to exceed the expectations of all potential & existing customers. To establish & ensure peace of mind, trust and long lasting relationships with our clients, a detailed workshop quality inspection is done on each of our pre-loved vehicles, along with a roadworthy test, full valet & body polish.

Our excellent sales manager, Werner Delport, works closely with his team to ensure competitive offers & excellent service is produced. Request a call back & one of our pre-loved professionals will contact you.

We welcome all trade-ins & deliver nation-wide on request.

#BBWelkom #ExceedingAllExpectations

attributes.description: 2017 TOYOTA HILUX 2.8 GD-6 SINGLE CAB ENGINE VERY CLEAN NICE SEAT Mileage: 97000 km. Colour: White Price: R274, 995 Neg Features: LEATHER NICE SEAT As Good As New Car, 3x3 Point Seat Belts, Driver airbag and Passenger airbag, Adjustable Seats, With Spare Tyre, Wheel, 18’’ inch Mags, Smash & grab, Anti theft system, ABS, Airbags, Air condition Spotless, White In Colour Low Mileage On Clock, Central Locking, and Gear Locking, New Tyres, Alloy Wheel's, Alarm and Mobilizer Power Steering, and Adjustable steering, Electric Windows, Electric Mirrors, Factory fitted Louder Mp3 Radio, Car Very Clean Inside And Outside, with Average Fuel of 7.9 litre per 100km. Excellent Body Condition, Excellent Interior Condition, Excellent Mechanical Condition, Excellent Overall Condition. This car is still very clean and has a Road worthy certificate. Definitely A Must See, Please Call/WhatsApp DE RM MOTORS To View All Vehicle, 1. We stock a wide variety of quality, used, low kilometre vehicles such as sedans, hatchbacks, SUVs and bakkies 2. All our second hand vehicles for sale undergo a stringent 116-point quality assuranc 3. Over 4,000 popular makes and models of used cars available 4. Finance and Insurance arranged on the spot 5. Finance available with all banks Neat and Immaculate Condition. going for both CASH / FINANCE! If you would like to come view or test drive the vehicle, we are situated at 14 JOHANNESBURG ROAD KEW

attributes.description:
When you move smart, you live smart, and the Celerio gives you the ability to do both. With all-new technologies, unmatched space, and safety features that outsmart the rest, the Celerio is a partner for a smart, satisfying driving experience. Book your test drive today! 


The Suzuki Celerio comes standard with a 2 year / 30 000 km Service Plan and a 5 year / 200 000 km Promotional Warranty. 

Trade Ins Welcome. Finance Available

attributes.description:
NON RECON DEAL
(The car has not been in for any prep work,Valet or repairs etc)

+ Optional 12 Month Warranty Available.

+ Vehicle is in a immaculate condition, come and view this vehicle.

+ We Deliver Nationwide, we are based just 40 min from Johannesburg.

+ Finance can be arranged.

+ Trade-Ins Welcome.

Why you must buy from Koos & Mike Used Cars:

1. Our Prices includes on the road cost.(CASH BUYS)

2. All our cars comes with a roadworthy certificate.

3. All cars will be delivered with a oil service before delivery.

4. Paperwork is our priority and not your responsibility.

5. Finance approvals is our goal.

6. You are our customer our advertisement and our reference for tomorrow.

7. The first 5 services on the car will be half price.

8. Warranty option available on all our cars (not included in selling price, can be taken out additionally)

9. We buy decent cars for cash.

10. All our cars have cartrack pre-installed. (Ts & Cs apply)

11. You get 1 free Valet for your vehicle before delivery

12. We offer an optional warranty package on all our vehicles with an R 7990 - R 19 000 installment

13. Ts & Cs APPLY

Please contact us for vehicle availability before you waste time and money on transport (our stock sells fast)
